Borders

Borders can be added to any element by adding the class of 'borders', or any of its modified classes to the html.

Border

Adding a class of border adds the basic grey, 1px wide border to all sides of the element.

Borders on Specific Sides

Borders can be added on only specific sides, using directional modifiers to the 'borders' class.

Border Thickness

Other border classes can be 'stacked' on the border classes to modify them. An example of this is the border thickness classes.

Border 2

Sets the border thickness to be 2 pixels thick

2 pixel thick border

                
                    

                        
2 pixel thick border

Border 3

Sets the border thickness to be 3 pixels thick

3 pixel thick border

                
                    

                        
3 pixel thick border

Border 4

Sets the border thickness to be 4 pixels thick

4 pixel thick border
